item.title: Build an Advanced RAG Pipeline with Qdrant, LlamaIndex, and Metadata Filtering
item.description: From Smart Ingestion to Orchestrated Hybrid Search - Learn how to build a high-performance RAG pipeline using smart ingestion, embeddings, Qdrant vector indexing, advanced metadata filtering, prompt enhancement, and orchestrated retrieval agents. üöÄ Introduction In this post, we‚Äôll explore how to build an advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline by combining several key technologies: üßπ Smart ingestion: cleaning, chunking,...

item.title: Panorama 2025: Key Trends in Data Science & Artificial Intelligence

item.title: COVID-19: Reflections on the Pandemic and Its Global Impact
item.description: Analysis of the health crisis that has turned the world upside down - This article represents only a fraction of the ongoing story of COVID-19. We will remain attentive to developments and progress made in the fight against this global pandemic.
